quest.name: Wine for the Road
journal: The stalwart soldier would request your company on a brief outing.
objectives: Sprinkle Gensui wine at the designated location.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: You are Forename Surname, the hero who hails from the West. Aye, 'tis plain from the glimmer in your eyes and the strength in your bearing. I realize this is sudden, but will you accompany me outside?

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: It shan't take long, nor will there be any danger. Just a scenic walk to sprinkle wine at a handful of places.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Doubtless you are wondering about the purpose of this activity. For now, I ask that you humor a comrade and think of it as a peculiar local tradition.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Here is the wine. Pray bring it with you to the docks. I shall tell you more as we make our way.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: There you are. You have the wine, I trust? Pray give these grounds here a dash of it.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: You have the wine I gave you, yes? Pray give these grounds here a dash of it.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: The One River was the lifeline of trade for Doma and the key to her prosperity. In the past, countless ships and barges bearing all manner of cargo would pass through here.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Come, let us move on. We next go to Monzen.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: The town of Monzen was once home to those samurai families who served under Lord Kaienâ”€kami rest his soul.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: And here was where many young warriors gathered to hone their swordfighting skills. Go ahead and give the grounds a sprinkle of wine.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Go ahead, my friend. Give the grounds a sprinkle of wine.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Good. Let us head to the western edge of town.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: This manor once belonged to His Excellency the Tairo, one of our nation's leaders. He was known as an outstanding warrior and an exceptional poet besides, one of his admirers being no less a personage than Lord Kaien himself.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Go on and sprinkle some wine here as well.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Go on, sprinkle some wine here as well.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: And that is the last spot. Let us make our way back, shall we?

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Now then, I believe an explanation is in order. Those places we visited are where many of our comrades fell fighting the Empire.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: When Yotsuyu tried to make an example of Monzen, they rose up and fought courageously to the last man.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: To receive an offering of wine from a hero such as you, I do not doubt that they will be pleased.

dialogue.name: SADNESSSAMURAI
dialogue.text: Aside from paying my respects, I wished to introduce you to them, you see. They will rest easier in the knowledge that we have allies strong and true who fight with us. My thanks for your company, Forename.

obj.n: How Tataru Got Her Groove Back
